EmailTemplate.name: ERP Parts Received Customer notification
EmailTemplate.subject: Your parts are ready for pickup
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.FirstName},
The parts that you have ordered from Legend boats have arrived {!AcctSeed__Project_Task__c.GMBLASERP__Product__c}, {!Product2.Description}, {!AcctSeedERP__Material__c.Material__c},{!AcctSeedERP__Material__c.Name} Please pick up your order at your earliest convenience.
Thank you,
